articles.title: Who Is Rishi Shah, Indian-American Jailed For Rs 8,300 Crore Fraud In US - NDTV
articles.description: Rishi Shah, an Indian-American businessman, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison for a Rs 8,300 crore ($1 billion) fraud involving his advertising startup.
articles.content:
Rishi Shah, the co-founder of Outcome Health, was indicted on over 12 counts of fraud.

articles.title: Kevin Costner’s ‘Horizon’ Box Office Boondoggle: ‘Yellowstone’ Fans Are (Largely) a No-Show - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Costner's ambitious Western 'Horizon: An American Saga — Chapter One' could barely break out of the barn in its North American debut, and yet there's already a sequel set for release in August (with a third resuming production that month, too).
articles.content: The fifth season of Taylor Sheridan’s Yellowstone — made famous in no small part because of its lead star Kevin Costner — enjoyed the top scripted series premiere of 2022 with 12.1 million viewers. J… [+5427 chars]
